name: Crazy Puzzles - Block Game (Slide Puzzles)
description:
Hey there, Gamers!
I am Mrunmay Prakash Pawar and this is my 1st game realeased on Play Store. I am 13 while developing this game and have almost completed a year of self-learnt Game Development.
This is a simple puzzle solving game, your aim is to simply remove the Player Block out of the Frame. There are 30 levels in all which have been devided into 3 parts:- The Biginner's Area, The Inter-Mediate's Area, and The Expert's Area. Try out this Game and test your Skills.
Contact me on my email:- mrunmayppawar@gmail.com
Check out my youtube channel:- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLnFCGeDxxX2M__TorA_rEQ

If there is some problem with this game or submission, please contact me on mrunmayppawar@gmail.com or on mycodetechnologies2020@gmail.com instead of just ignoring it.
